page.title: 03GAYE'S DISCO
page.content: Every Monday night I go to the disco at "The Soldiers", (The British Legion Social club).The dance starts at 7.00p.m.It costs 40p to get in.Members of the club don't have to pay.All the girls wear colourful fashionable clothes.Skirtsand blouses,trousers and tops,T-shirts, jumpers and cardigans. The latest style in jumpers is called a "Bat wing".The current "in"shoe style are "Winkle pickers",which are flat soled with sharp pointed toes, ideal for the spinning,twisting and turning movements of disco dancing. When I go to the dance I usually wear my pink skin tight ski pants, with a pink and white neat fitting blouse . Music is provided by Baz the local D.J. who plays popular records for dancing Rock and Roll,Break dancing and Robotics.
